text: Aron Eisenberg (January 6, 1969 â€“ September 21, 2019) was an American actor. He was born in Los Angeles, California. Eisenberg was known for his role as Nog on Star Trek: Deep Space Nine. He appeared on Tales from the Crypt, Amityville: The Evil Escapes, Parker Lewis Can't Lose, The Wonder Years, and General Hospital. Eisenberg died on September 21, 2019 in Los Angeles from a heart attack caused by kidney disease at the age of 50. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1969 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Deaths from kidney disease Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from Los Angeles
title: Aron Eisenberg
